website_summaries.verdict: Extremely affordable, but offer the same UV, glare and blue light protection as higher end models. Ideal for occasional computer work, tablet use or television viewing.
pros: Lenses are light yellow, not a dark tint
cons: Frames are easily bent and can arrive misaligned
Smudges and fingerprints difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: they fit so well and don’t look gaudy or fake ...
customer_reviews.text: they fit so well and don’t look gaudy or fake. they are completely helpful with blocking blue light. the protective case gives you so much more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aleta C Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Works great for casual use!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a serving job to a computer job. And my eyes were not ready for it! The first couple days I was getting tension headaches in the front of my head and these glasses definitely help! If you have very serious problems I would probably recommend something a little more heavy duty, but for just day to day they look nice, they are lightweight (which I actually really like because I don’t feel something heavy resting on my nose), and they do help relieve mild to medium eye strain. Would definitely reccommend to someone with normal eyesight who wants to give their eyes a little TLC while working at a computer all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mis7aken

customer_reviews.title: Gamma RAY 010 Slim Vintage Computer Readers Reading Glasses 0.0
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the computer glasses, no magnification. I have been using them for a week and have noticed my eyes are less dry. They look very nice, I have received compliments, and some of my coworkers want to buy the glasses. I ordered the black by mistake, I wanted the tortoise, but I love them in black. Arrived fast. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and warehouse environments, and unfortunately my eyes are sensitive to everything! They get dry, tired, etc in environments with any kind of artificial lighting or dust particals floating around. Thankfully, these glasses help a ton! I can feel a significant difference when I wear them. I don't get so exhausted, my eyes don't become itchy or tired, and I feel overall more alert. Additionally, the yellow tinge of the lenses is almost imperceptible, plus the design of the glasses is super fashionable and flattering to most face shapes. In short, I love these glasses! I even use them to watch television at night. One of the best purchases I've ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comparison review:  this was the second favorite at 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of differing computer glasses:  Readers Gaming Glasses: These are larger size lens and seem like something you would use in a movie theater for 3D viewing, the plasticy, bulky feel. But not terrible, suitable for my son's needs doing his homeschool on the computer. 4 stars  Ray 010 slim Vintage These were for me to have the readers while working on my lap top. Only wish they had the spring hinges like the ones below. That would add to the comfort, but otherwise OK-4.5 stars  Spring Hinges Retro Liked these the best due to the style and spring hinges. I would choose these again. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: CPCMommy

customer_reviews.title: Headaches and Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are okay. They do not fit the face of the person I ordered them for (standard male face size). So, I used them for myself instead. We ordered zero magnification, however, these do magnify and as a result I get mild headaches. I asked someone else to test them out and they had the same issue. I contacted the seller for an exchange (perhaps the wrong pair were sent to me) or an explanation to better clarify the experience I was having. Not one word from the seller. Customer service is still an important aspect of business.
customer_reviews.author: Faeridrops

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THESE.
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly people. I've been struggling with severe eye strain and headaches for the past couple of weeks and just heard about these glasses recently so I decided to pick them up to see if they'd help. Ever since I've started wearing them I've had absolutely no strain or headaches. I work on my computer all day and stream on Twitch every night for 3 hours so I get a lot of exposure to screens. These have helped 100% and would recommend to anyone looking to pick some up. Oh yeah, and they're stylish as heck!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with these glasses! I had ordered different brand but had to return right away after trying them on b/c they were too heavy and uncomfortable, and somewhat blurry. These are perfect! Lightweight, super comfy and blocks out blue light when I'm working on dual-screen monitors. And they're very stylish, the lenses/fram are not too big and perfect for my face. My eyes don't feel strained anymore when wearing these, definitely can feel the difference. For the price, defnitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Do what they are intended for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Blue Light Blocking Glasses Anti Glare 1.75 Power, to replace a heavier, higher power computer glasses, as my wife won't let me use hers. I like the light weight, the fixed nose pads, and the flexable frames. Like my wife, I like simple things. These fit the bill and do exactly what they are intended for. I am wearing them now as I write this review. They also came with a nice hard case and cleaning cloth. Very relaxing on the eyes and keeps my wife happy too, as she can be less vigilant about her own pair.
customer_reviews.author: Deerail

customer_reviews.title: Great, but doesn't fit all noses
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and really mitigates headaches. My only complaint is that it really isn't well suited for people without a very tall nose bridge. Because my nose is smaller and somewhat flat, the glasses usually slip to sit right above the tip of my nose. If I can get them to balance where they should be, they are squished right up against my eyelashes and I have no room to blink. I love this product but I would definitely recommend that manufacturer create a version where there are some sort of nose pads or pad arms for these.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses—life saver! The fact that they have magnification with the blue blocking is great. Been able to read 2x longer even on phone. I got 1x mag normal and they work fine both with laptop and close reading. The vintage style fits my smaller face (rare) and are very lightweight. Can’t beat for the price. Will need to be careful- they feel delicate but no more so than drugstore readers and hopefully better. Nice carrying case. Would recommend and buy again. This is an authentic review with no compensation. Hope it helps someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Anon e. Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit perfect. I have compared to other glasses with a more clear lens and these dont reflect anny more blue light. Certainly not a laser as shown in the picture. I used a led blue diode and about half of the light penetrated same as others. I don't know why they tint the lens so hard with yellow. Makes you look really weird when people see you. This is probably to make the product seem more effective to the unknowing user.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: They actually works
customer_reviews.text: I thought blue light glasses with a bit of a hoax until I got a new job that had me staring at a screen all day. The first week my eyes were bloodshot and tired. So, I purchased a pair and haven't had any issue with my eyes since! These are light and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses for ppl using tech devices all day
customer_reviews.text: I like this pair of glasses. It’s lightweight, comfortable, and affordable. It has a slight yellow tint to it, which wouldn’t bother me when I used it for looking at computer or my phone. However, it does bother me when I am drawing on a display table of some sort and I’m drawing in color. The yellow tint affects the color to looks warmer than it actually is so it’s kinda annoying but good glasses nonetheless less. Idk if these help with eye strain and headaches because I’ve never noticed that on myself before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Effective
customer_reviews.text: These feel and look better than I expected given their cost. I wear them daily at work to reduce the effects of my constant screen time, and genuinely feel a difference since starting the practice. It's helped to reduce fairly frequent headaches, and reduce the glare of the florescent lights in my office. They're an excellent investment, especially given the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have good vision but have developed eye strain and optical migraines over the past 2 years at my desk job. I'm wearing these glasses right now. I keep them on almost 100% of the time at my desk and they've really saved me so much in terms of eye strain, headaches, and overall tired feeling I used to get at the end of the day. They are very cute and comfortable; the yellow tint to the lenses is pretty obvious, but not too bad. They kind of perpetually look like transition lenses that haven't quite gone down to clear, so I don't find it distracting and I don't think others do either. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mom2many

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Very lightweight and comfortable - I forget I have them on most of the time. Noticed a huge difference by the end of the first day. Eye fatigue and dryness was much less. I forgot to wear them for most of yesterday, and my eyes made me pay the price. I had no idea I'd notice such a difference. Comes with a nifty carrying case and cloth. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Save your eyesight with these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for watching tv after my eye dr said the led lights are bad for the eyes. Maybe psychological but I feel like my eyes are less ‘tired’ when I use them AND I sleep better (especially on those binge-tv nights)! If sceptical like me, just google ‘effects of blue light on sleep’ and give them a try. I will be buying more for backup & travel.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: Not to sound dramatic, but if I'm getting a headache from the lights at work and I put these on, my headache will literally go away within 15 mins. People around the office have tried them on and always tell me they like mine better than the ones they have. Also they're one of the cuter pairs out there imo. 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: destanye

customer_reviews.title: They may block blue lights helping me get to sleep quicker at night.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I’ve only had these glasses a week or two. It may be my imagination that they help but I think they might help me get to sleep faster using them than not using them. I don’t like the fit because they are way too big for my head. But admittedly I have troubles with hats being too big too. If I change my mind and swing to the notion that I am enjoying only a temporary positive placebo reaction I will try to remember to pop back on here and update this review. As for now I think they are annoyingly loose fitting, not particularly attractive given the yellow lenses but they may actually be helping with my insomnia.
customer_reviews.author: Skyeisle

customer_reviews.title: It probably isn't the best one but come on
customer_reviews.text: This one is cute and works! It probably isn't the best one but come on, it's like 12 and like I said — iit works! I highly recommend to anyone looking for blue ray blocking glasses. I use it on my MacBook with flux (blue light blocker program) and presto, and BYE headache behind the eye. I've ordered 3 from Amazon and one broke, one smelled and had a reflective coating on the inside, and the other didn't fit my face. So get it if you have a smaller sized face and looking for practical blue-ray blocking glasses while still looking cute.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: I’m a gamer and I was getting worried about my eyes getting fatigued and damaged from all the blue light. These were inexpensive. But they are a little blurry and there is some distortion. I’m sure if I wore them enough i might get used to them. But they are a little annoying. Slips off my nose a little too. But don’t really wear them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: heenalu5

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glasses that do what they claim
customer_reviews.text: First off, they're probably the best cheaters I have. Second, the glare reduction is phenomenal. I've tried built-in blue light reducers but everything is made so yellowy, it's worse to look at than the original (yes, Kindle, this means you). When I use these, it's such a slight change that I don't notice much until I go to take them off. Then I wonder how I could look at any screen without them. They don't look too tinted either so most people probably wouldn't even know everything they do. I recommend them and would buy again. PS: I also love the firm-sided case they came in. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with low nose bridges :)
customer_reviews.text: Very LIGHT and stylish pair of glasses. I really wish I knew about these sooner! I stare at a computer screen for at least 10 hours a day and have seen a noticeable difference from a week from wearing these. My eye strain has been reduced and I don't do that thing where I squeeze the area above my nose, in between my eyes from strain/pressure. Perfect if you have a low nose bridge--they don't slip off and stay on comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my eyes were getting so strained from using the computer that I could barely even stand to be on the computer for that long. I almost bought $95 glasses that filter out blue light, and I'm extremely glad that I didn't. I love wearing these. They're lightweight, which I appreciate. When I'm not wearing contacts, I wear prescription glasses that I absolutely loathe because of the weight, which in turn gives me headaches. I can wear these gamma ray glasses all day with little to no discomfort. Most importantly, my eyes no longer feel tired or strained.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are great for their price point and so far seem to be helping a lot when staring at my laptop working all day! My only complaint is that these glasses are SUPER reflective... and I’m not talking your normal average reflection in glasses... enough that you can clearly see everything I’m looking at! So I have to take them off for meetings/ virtual presentations so I don’t have my entire screen reflected on my glasses that it completely blocks off my face. (Photo shows my face tilted to avoid the reflection) But definitely would recommend these! They came in a a structured zip case with a cleaning cloth too which I really liked.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, less eye strain, lightweight, good price point
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great. The slight yellow tint of the lenses (and whatever other magic is involved with these glasses) really relieves the strain on my eyes while I work at my computer all day. The glasses even help while working on stark white paperwork and when using my smartphone. My only complaint is that the case came with a small water stain of some sort. The reflective blue looks kinda cool, and the price was very, very right. They are lightweight and comfortable, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: clairenortham

customer_reviews.title: Feel natural , comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I am comparing to another brand which caused me tremendous headaches. It’s very comfortable and feels natural. I really dislike the design - preferring rimless and silver setting small-rectangular not squarish like these. But hey these look ok and comfortable as far as vision goes. My other glasses (the coating) were not vision friendly and caused headache. These do not!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sher

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses but a slight yellowish tint!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful glasses! I’ve been using them for maybe a little over 2 weeks now and I feel great! I mainly use them for fashion but as a digital artist I also use them to protect my eyes and I think they’re doing a fine job since I’ve been noticing issues with my sight prior to buying these. The only reason I gave them 4 stars is because there is a slight yellowish tint. It can be a little disorienting as an artist but you can work through it. People looking at you can’t seem to see the yellow tint and it looks perfectly clear from the outside, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Meh. They don’t block very much blue light. Where are the facts?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a week ago, and I have hesitations about this product. It’s a little strange the company doesn’t list any facts about their blue light blocking technology ... I’m an engineering student and these things matter. Otherwise you are just falling prey to fancy words and big promises. From the “blue light tests” I have tried, these glasses have failed every one horribly. I wouldn’t buy these again as I’m realizing there is a reason this company has no statistics on how much blue light is blocked (from a range of 0-100%). As a best guess, I would say they *maybe* block up to 45%, and that is being generous. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Pirkey

customer_reviews.title: dims bright lights, great for night shifters :)
customer_reviews.text: Got these after getting LASIK eye surgery to help protect my eyes and keep them healthy. I love them! I work night shift and am on the computer charting in a dark room and the bright screen lights were giving me crazy headaches, these glasses are tinted yellow so they help dim that light so much! Always wear them while charting on computers or watching TV in the dark. My only complaint is that after several hours of wearing them the tops of my ears where they rest get sore, but that would probably be an issue with any glasses you wear for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: tarynlee757

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting more pairs!
customer_reviews.text: I was becoming concerned about the effect of blue light exposure on my sleep cycle, so I thought it would be a good idea to get a product like this. I chose this because I like the style and the clear frames. They are so lightweight that I hardly know I have them on and they fit my face perfectly. They are now my go-to glasses and I don't even wear my metal framed glasses anymore. If one spends a lot of time in front of a computer or TV screen I would recommend wearing blue light blocking glasses even if there is no visual impairment. Your sleep will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Less Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I spend most of my day on a computer and was having headaches. My headaches have been greatly reduced with these glasses. I can tell when I forget to put them on. I have been meaning to see if they also work on night time driving as well. Overall extremely satisfied with purchase. Even comes with a case to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: Kali B.

customer_reviews.title: Reduce eye strain - I use when playing cell phone games
customer_reviews.text: Finally I've found a true blue light blocker set of glasses!!!! It pays to spend a little more to get what you need. These are great! Recently started playing games on my cell phone-- increased my eye strain. These help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love them so far!
customer_reviews.text: You can't tell from the photo but i have very light colored eyes- pale blueish gray- & because of that, I am sensitive to light. So in addition to these glasses helping with sleep they also save me from eye strain and light related headaches. I don't have anything negative to say at all- i will wear these every night & whenever im on my computer/phone for extended periods of time :)
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Less eye strain
customer_reviews.text: My grandson spends way too much time on screens. He sometimes complains about tired, burning eyes. Gave him these glasses a few days ago. He is very happy with them; says his eyes feel much better with them on, when he's on a screen devise. And they look very good on him.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fashionable yet do the job
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase, because I misplaced the first. I love these, and the case and cleaning cloth are just icing on the cake. My only quibble is that I had to buy black frames instead of clear, which are indefinitely unavailable. I can imagine why; I will keep watching to see if the clear version comes back in stock and I'll buy a third pair for sure.
customer_reviews.author: jmeander

customer_reviews.title: Helped eye strain and sleep
customer_reviews.text: Never used reading glasses before but found I was straining my eyes at night to read books or digital copies of books. I’ve slept 10 hours a night ON ACCIDENT the past two nights after using them on and off all day. The most I’ve slept in a LONG time. Definitely know it’s because of these glasses. They have a yellow tint to them which is different from the knockoff versions but still cute enough to wear in public.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Reduces strain and headaches significantly for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think these glasses would make a difference, but the slight tint on the lenses reduces my eye fatigue drastically. At the end of the work day my headaches are reduced. After binge watching TV shows at night my eyes aren't strained. Plus, I always hate the way glasses look on me. I have a flat/low bridge and most of the time glasses never look or fit right. These are relatively comfortable and fit well. I will admit, they are pretty small so maybe those with a bigger head may not feel as comfortable with these on. Otherwise, I think they are great and do the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lam

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper glasses, still no headaches
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to replace my brand name pair that cost four times as much as these. Of course, I instantly like these better. The lens tint is perfect for my use (coding mostly) and they are super lightweight. They came with a nice molded EVA case. The only drawback I can see for price is that they aren’t too sturdy- they’d definitely break from a long fall or if you sat on them. Way better deal than the name brands. I’ll be sticking with these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Carlton

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd be turned off by the yellow tint but it's barely noticable. Honestly I've tried a few blue light filter glasses and these are by far the best. Comfortable, light, and aren't bothersome (especially for someone who doesnt wear glasses normally) between Working in a florescent filled office and staring at screens all day I was having daily migraines. These helped big time
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: Packaged fine with an inexpensive but adequate case and cleaning cloth. The glasses do make it more comfortable for your eyes in the evening/dark/low-light conditions. Glasses aren't the highest quality, but not the cheapest either. They do the job and are helpful and I would probably purchase them again. Seller was good.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well these glasses were made.......and how lightweight and comfortable they are to wear! I did not notice any glare.....and surprise, they came with a zip glasses case and cloth! I am so glad that I chose these glasses---and the extra bonus was that the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: bashell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and quite helpful I must say.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely. Very very little glare, helps my eyes over long periods of hardcore, slanderous, sweatypalmed, casual/weebstomping gaming on my playstaesh. Eyes feel great after hours of gaming. Get them and git gud.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott C.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Glasses That Actually Work
customer_reviews.text: These blue light blocking glasses are phenomenal! I wish that I had known about them long ago, but am happy that I know now. This particular pair is for my husband as he needs the reading glasses portion part. He loves that he can read and use his tablet or phone at night without bright blue lights interfering with his internal clock. They arrived nicely packaged and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: JBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I needed reading glasses and wanted to give the blue light blocking technology a try within one product. I am very satisfied with these glasses. I ordered the clear frame with a -1.5 correction and they are perfect. Other reading glasses have given me a headache after wearing there for any length of timed to tightness along side of head, bridge of nose, too heavy, etc. I will likely be purchasing a second pair to keep at work. Thanks for a great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Limegreenteri

customer_reviews.title: A great help!
customer_reviews.text: I spend hours every day on the computer. My eyes had begun to burn and itch a lot! These glasses are comfortable, and my eyes are are not burning and itching anymore. I've also discovered practical things that help, such as looking away for about 20 seconds every few minutes. But, before I got the glasses, looking away every few minutes just wasn't enough. I would definitely buy again. These are UV400 and blue light protective.
customer_reviews.author: booksalot

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that's helped ease my migraine pain!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a godsend. I have suffered from intractable chronic migraines for 6 years and ha e tried everything to treat them from Botox shots to week long hospitalizations at UCSF. Fluorescent lights and blue lights are a trigger for me, and I debated buying a similar pair of glasses from another company for over $100. I'm SO glad I found these instead! Not only are they cute and stylish, but they are the only thing that has helped ease my migraine pain since....well, ANYTHING. I can't wait to tell my neurologist.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: 11 bucks well spent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of gamma rays... I got these ones for way cheaper (11 bucks) and I think they are better than my others, although both are good. The only issue I have with gamma rays, are it's incredibly difficult to get fingerprints/oils off of the lense. But other than that, these would easily sell for 50 or 60 with a different name on them. My eyes definitely feel better when staring at a computer or tv screen. A must have for anyone using a computer for hours a day... They also look pretty good to.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! its the best purchased ive made it! they are not just light, comfortable, make me look super modern and geeky and sexy: D lol, and the best part of that since i use it i never have more red eyes, head aches nothing !! they are magnificent! i purchased 2 more of them for my two kids and they love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Monica H. Bello

customer_reviews.title: Very good glasses
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a second pair of these. Not that I need them yet. Bought my first pair back in July. They really help with the computer glare and try as I might I have yet not been able to break them. I have smashed them in my pocket, sat on them and even laid on them several times and the darn things just won’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Mike JB

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I’m a full time online student and I am on my laptop all day everyday. I used to get headaches everyday and now I can be doing coursework all day and my eyes don’t feel horrible at the end of the day. They are stylish and have a bit of a glare to them, and look really yellow tinted in person but I am totally fine with that because my headaches are gone!
customer_reviews.author: RaeganS

customer_reviews.title: Good computer glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have 20/20 vision, however, I am starting to need a little help with reading the computer. I like the yellow tint that filters the blue light. That really helps me not get headaches and migraines. I did not care for the magnification. I have to get really close to the screen at work to see, so it was not helpful. I will be purchasing another pair without magnification to see if that is better. I can use the ones with the magnification at home. I like them overall.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Frontera

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and effective
customer_reviews.text: I work all day in front of a computer and play a lot of video games at home. These glasses help with the glare and long term eye strain that comes from looking at screen all day, and they look good too! I was surprised at how lightweight they were. Easy to wear and they protect your eyes. I highly recommend these for anyone who spends a lot of time in front of a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Luna4x0

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: i bought this book to help with my eczema and so far so good i need to fully change my diet but the little changes i have done so far i have noticed improvements in my skin - i thought it had a lot of great info in it! there is a helpful supplements pages in the back of the book which was nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: I can't reccomend these enough. My eyes would constantly be hurting from looking at my phone or monitor, even at minimal brightness and using night modes. I was using eyes drops all the time and getting headaches. Decided to try these and after not too long my eyes stopped hurting all the time. I wear these glasses every day and it's been literally months since I actually HAD to use eye drops. The glasses are very light and SO comfortable. They even look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck blue light blocking glasses. Fit and finish is excellent. They aren’t 100 dollar Italian frames, but they’re sub $20 so adjust your expectations accordingly. That said, then lenses are nice with no ugly reflection/glare, they aren’t too yellow like Gunnars, and they’re lightweight and hardly noticeable. All that and they’ve completely killed any eye strain issues I had from working on my computer at the office. But then!
customer_reviews.author: Rhys

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Happy customer. Thumbs way up.
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality build and best quality lenses I’ve seen for such affordable glasses. Super helpful for staring at screens All day which is the main reason I got these.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with these! Totally worth it for the price and I may ending up buying a few more pairs (have a pair at work, t home, in my purse, etc.). These are comfortable and look great. I've only used them for 2 days, but sine a lot of my job is coding macros in excel these have really helped with the eye strain I used to get from staring at a computer screen all day. Definitely recommend this and from this buyer! Came in a nice case with cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jackattack

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I work at home full time from my laptop, and use my cell phone alot so this came in handy. The first day I noticed that I did not wake up with a lingering migraine! The light blocker in this is subtle to where you do not notice the offset of colors around you but it does have enough strength to block those harmful lights.
customer_reviews.author: Ceeceelala

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses because I read that they helped with headache relief. I get terrible migraines, some of which are caused or exacerbated by extended periods of time at the computer for work; these glasses have greatly reduced the severity.
customer_reviews.author: Will Lc

customer_reviews.title: Actually work! GREAT investment
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are amazing. Of course, I can't compare them to others, but after using them for about 20 minutes, I took them off to look at the screen and it was CRAZY how different my eyes adjusted...I didn't want to even look at the computer screen! I can tell they're LEGITIMATELY working. I'm actually really surprised. Do NOT regret this. Might even get some as stocking stuffers!
customer_reviews.author: B. Mcalister

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: These actually work! I bought these to use with my Nintendo Switch because long hours playing Animal Crossing makes my eyes burn like crazy, causing me to fall asleep super early. I had tried another pair of blue light glasses I ordered from Amazon and I had the same problem. I just played for maybe 3 hours and my eyes feel great! I am super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: early on I am seeing great results. Screen is clear
customer_reviews.text: I am just a few days in with my new glasses. I am an IT Pro who naturally is in front of a Digital Screen Everyday, all Day. I am replacing my prescription reading glasses with these Gamma Ray's. So far , early on I am seeing great results. Screen is clear, and my eyes seem to be less tired after hours of work. I am looking forward to great results going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Fred O.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty miraculous. AND they look very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I work in front of 2 monitors all day, and also read a lot on my Kindle device and the Kindle app on my phone. I noticed I was getting headaches daily, and had blurry vision long into the night. When I started wearing these all day, it changed everything. I do not have headaches or blurry vision at night anymore at all. Pretty miraculous. AND they look very stylish. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: great view
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these glasses to read my computer. When I took off my regular glasses and put these on,looked at the computer, I was amazed at the difference. The computer glare was gone and my eyes didn't bother as much at the end of the day as they usually did. Love these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: nancypik

customer_reviews.title: You need these if you look at a screen all day
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I have noticed better sleep quality since I started wearing them while staring at a screen all day. I've gotten so used to wearing them that now it feels strange looking at a computer without them.
customer_reviews.author: Tnh225

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, not cheap looking, discreet
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great. They look almost exactly like my expensive pair of regular glasses. The tint is noticeable enough for the eyes, but not too noticeable to others.
customer_reviews.author: Addi C

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, got rid of my daily headaches
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and lightweight, and the yellow tint is almost not noticeable. It’s nice to have a pair of these that are stylish, especially if I’m wearing them to work. My job, like a lot of people’s, involves looking at computer screens pretty much all day. I used to get headaches every day by the time I got off, and my eyes were always tired and dry, but I noticed an immediate difference with these. No headaches, no itchy eyes. Definitely worth a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with eye strain.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. They did help but once a migraine starts there’s no stoping it and these glasses helped me keep going through my eye strain and pressure I feel when I have one. Although eventually I do have to find a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but effective!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to reduce eye strain after LASIK. Not as trendy looking as I'd hoped and my spouse diplomatically told me to save them for home/the computer, but they are light and fit comfortably on my small face, and most importantly, they WORK! LEDs and industrial lighting hurt my eyes after surgery, but these allow me to function normally without pain. For the price, you really can't beat the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: These have really made a difference in getting headaches and eye strain while looking at my computer for long periods of time. The only problem is they seem to scratch very easily. Are the lenses made of durable enough materials? Do they have protective coats on them? I don’t know how to fix that problem but could use some work.
customer_reviews.author: California Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable but sit low on my face. I admit that I expected this since they are not specifically made for women; I will try adding a pair of silicone nose pads (I just ordered them) to see if this helps. Overall, these are a great purchase and work well for keeping the computer glare from causing eyestrain.
customer_reviews.author: Macey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Reduced eye strain
customer_reviews.text: I am on my computer for work and school over 15 hours a day. At the end of the day, my eyes were hurting and tired. The glasses have definitely helped and the bonus is that it came with a case and cloth for cleaning. They are lightweight and I honestly forget I am wearing them except the bright white is no longer an issue. My eyes thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Star H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Can immediately tell a difference as soon as you put them on! I stare at 2 giant screens all day, and I can feel the tension leave my eyes when I put these on.
customer_reviews.author: Shalon

customer_reviews.title: Construction weak.
customer_reviews.text: Although the lenses did reduce the glare on the computer screen....my reason for purchasing this product...I immediately recognized the construction was very poor. I felt sure the arms would not remain connected for long or that they would not remain in position properly because they wiggled at the connection on glasses before i ever placed them on my face. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta H.

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable blue light blocking eyeglasses
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and they work very well. They are good for eye strain from staring at a computer screen all day.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!! And stylish too
customer_reviews.text: My naturopath recommended getting these because I had told her about how I felt like my eyes hurt so bad. Once my eyes start to feel strained, that’s what gives me a headache. Being a student, I’m having to use my computer a lot for working and I can’t take a break every 10 minutes. Just getting up and looking around didn’t help. I’ve had them for 4 days and I love them!! It definitely helps me not squint and I haven’t experienced a headache like the ones I had before
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Definitely help with the glare and blocking
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit better than the last ones I ordered and are very lightweight. They have more glare blocking power also. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: notbarb

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom. She needs reading glasses and stares at a computer all day for work. She often complained about eye strain after work. Since using these, her eye strain has decreased tremendously. She believes these really work and she loves them. The clear frames also look cute on her and go with all her office outfits. I would recommend these to anyone who has to look at a computer for work.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: I waited to review these glasses to see if they would work long term.
customer_reviews.text: These are inexpensive computer glasses that work very well and I enjoy using them on the computer both day and night. I would recommend them when compared to the much higher priced glasses out there. My son bought a pair of the high price glasses and the lens work basically the same although the style of his glasses are much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Norman A

customer_reviews.title: The mellow yellow tint on the glasses is really nice, it kind of mellows everything out
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few weeks now as I am always looking at a computer monitor/screen at work, school, when I use my phone, and at home. These glasses have made a real difference in the amount of glare and eye strain. The mellow yellow tint on the glasses is really nice, it kind of mellows everything out. Definitely take some time to get used to if you don't wear glasses usually.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses really work to reduce computer eye stain. They are made well. The shipping was fast. I just wish that the glasses would come in a smaller size but other than that, these glasses are great
customer_reviews.author: Mimi57

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: So here's the thing, I had LASIK surgery performed about a year ago. I see 20/20 now but I do have some problems staring at my laptop for long periods of time to do my homework. When i first got these in, i was apprehensive but i must say I LOVE these. Now lets talk about why i'm only giving it two stars. I haven't owned these glasses no more then three weeks and every time i used them i always put them back in their protective case. They broke today, which makes no sense to me. I'm apprehensive to purchase again. Nice concept but it could have probably been created a l little better.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about these glasses since most of the blue light blocking/computer glasses seem much more expensive. However, I noticed a difference right away after putting my glasses on. I work on a computer 9+ hours every day and constantly experience headaches and eye fatigue. These glasses made a difference right away. They have a bit of a yellow tint and you can see the blue light reflected in the lenses, so I would never wear them around the office, only while sitting at my computer. If you're willing to sacrifice style for comfort, these glasses do the trick for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Anyone who is at a computer or on their phone or even watching TV should have these!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great glasses and I recommend everyone get a pair. I never realized how much eye strain I had at the end of the day. These really make a difference. Sadly I missed placed them after a month and can't find them. Now they're out of stock and hope they will come back in stock soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye Relief
customer_reviews.text: Just got my glasses today, they seem to be working really well for PC eyestrain
customer_reviews.author: crrulif

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made. I used to get headaches all the time, but these stopped it. I am really grateful I took the chance and bought these. I have converted a ton of people by wearing these at work!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Effective, and nice looking..
customer_reviews.text: These are very effective in reducing blue light. I also use them as just reading glasses at night to filter lamp light. The price is fair. But bear in mind these are best suited for office/inside usage, not that of say a dedicated gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Change in Eye Fatigue
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Gamma Ray blocker glasses from Amazon. As a designer, I spend the majority of my day staring at a computer screen. The difference in my eye fatigue is noticeable after a day of use. Typically, I apply moisturizing drops throughout the day, only to be left with bloodshot eyes. Wearing the glasses, my eyes look and feel so much better. I was skeptical to say the least, but at around $15, I figured it was worth a try. They actually work, and are stylish enough to wear throughout the day. I'm a fan and would recommend to anyone who spends long hours staring at a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Eich

customer_reviews.title: Actually made a difference
customer_reviews.text: I need to look at computers all day for my job (software developer) and I was getting headaches/blurry vision/itchy eyes. Pretty surprised when I ordered these and all of those symptoms went away. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much came back for 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these glasses on a recommendation from a co-worker, couldn't believe how well they helped with eye strain. Recently lost my original pair, tried readers for the week the eye strain was intense decided to purchase a replacement pair the only reason for 4 stars was they were out of the strength I need so I bumped up the maganification, they work but I can tell they're a tad strong. Give them a try you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sand in my soul

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for reading and eliminating computer glare!
customer_reviews.text: Received my glasses last night. Using them today I can already see the difference! I work in the hospital and much of my time is documenting my notes in the computer. The glare problem is so much better and my eyes do not feel as strained
customer_reviews.author: Deb Pennypacker

customer_reviews.title: Been using for months and am obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these back in August and have been using them every day at work. They make a world of difference for me, and if I forget them at home one day my eyes really feel it. Most people in the office thought they were real, prescription glasses and were surprised to find out I got them off Amazon purely for staring at the computer screen. I've never had an issue with the quality or anything like that. I'm actually planning on buying another pair to keep at home.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches from my screens
customer_reviews.text: I get headaches from my online college homework and fluorescent lights in classrooms and these glasses have helped! Only downside is how often I need to clean them....I've never worn glasses before so maybe that's a normal thing to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & cant beat this price!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for work as a nurse. Equally great for working on the computer AND starting IVs & playing/shopping on my phone (when I’m not working of course!). Very lightweight and they don’t leave indentations on my nose or behind my ears! Will buy more to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: Kid/Small-Adult Size... Good tint though.
customer_reviews.text: If they were adult size they would've been 5 stars because the tint gradient on the glass was well made. These are ridiculously tiny. Best for kids and small-adults sized heads. Medium to Large heads should not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: LegzRandom

customer_reviews.title: Great for my desk job!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these every day for the last few months at my desk job and they are amazing. I have noticed decreased headaches and my eyes no longer strain. The lenses do smudge easily but a microfiber cloth does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great but crooked
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses and they do prevent eye strain. However, they are crooked (see picture) and the color/filter is not completely saturated across the entire lens (I have 0 strength lenses). I don't know if you can tell by the photo, but the strength fades as you go down the lens.
customer_reviews.author: JKarki

customer_reviews.title: Very good computer glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have recently transitioned to using my home computer more often and the distance is such that slight magnification makes reading the screen much easier. I selected 1.25x for my Gamma Ray glasses. They are comfortable to wear for long periods and ease the strain of looking at the screen. Plus, I think I look pretty darn good in the tortoise shell frames and lenses!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Reed

product_meta.title: Blue Light Blocking Glasses Anti Glare 0.00 Power
feature_bullets: Package Includes: 1 Pair – Computer Glasses with amber tinted lenses to minimize Digital Eye Strain caused by harmful blue light emitted from digital screens. Complimentary frame carrying case and cleaning cloth.

Alleviates visual fatigue and discomfort from long periods of web surfing, gaming and working under fluorescent lights. These light sensitivity glasses also come with UV400 protection and glare reduction.

Ultra-lightweight and flexible TR90 nylon frame material for durability and comfortable long-term wear. Casual frame design keeps you looking professional and stylish while working or playing video games.

Your computer reading glasses magnification/power depends on how far you are from the screen you are viewing. For a laptop or desktop about 19+ inches away, select a magnification HALF your normal reading power. For a smartphone, tablet or a book about 12 to 18 inches away, select your normal reading power.

Try today absolutely risk free with our 90 Days Money Back Satisfaction Guarantee and experience the quality under our Lifetime frame and lens breakage Warranty coverage. If the product does not work out for you, simply contact us for a full refund or replacement.
